attributes.action: stop Importing workers from outside the U.K and give BRITISH workers a chance to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In veiw of what is happening today at Killingholm oil rfineries it should be a wake up call for this nation and also this goverment We the BRITISH ARE FED UP
BEING SECOND CLASS CITIZENS IN OUR OWN COUNTRY we therefore petition the goverment to start be a goverment for this nation instead of the EU being prime intrest PUT US FIRST

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
